name: jLayer Parallax Slider
author: Unizoe Web Solutions

sections.description:
This plugin can create parallax sliders using varity of objects such as images, text titles, background boxes and youtube/vimeo videos.
The jquery plugin used by jLayer parallax slider is highly optimized and features video autoplay and supports different types of animation easing options.

The plugin also features a powerful inbuilt editor, that will allow you to configure every single detail of the slider without any coding knowledge. Using inbuilt editor’s drag and drop interface you can easily add/edit slide’s individual item, while controling different animation options.

jLayer Parallax Slider homepage

jLayer Parallax Slider demo
sections.installation:
Install instructions : –

  1. Upload jlayer-parallax-slider to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place <?php echo jlayer_parallax(array('id'=>'id of slider')); ?> in your templates
sections.faq:
How can I add a slider to a post/page?

You can add a slider to a post using shortcode [jlayer-parallax id=’slider_id’].
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Better video handling
  • Overall admin panel changes for adding, removing and updating objects
  • Added Link objects
  • Integrated 3 fonts
  • Release
